On July 31, 2025, Roseburg Police responded to an incident in Roseburg, involving interference with firefighting efforts during an active fire near Mt. Nebo.
Christopher Alan Page, age 41, of Roseburg, was cited for interfering with a firefighter after he flew a drone over the fire zone, hindering critical aerial
articles.title: Roseburg Police Cite Individual for Interfering with Firefighter During Mt. Nebo Fire

articles.description: An estimated four-acre wildland fire ignited on Mt. Nebo near I-5 milepost 124 at 6:30 p.m. Thursday. DFPA, Roseburg Fire, and Central Douglas crews attacked by ground and air until drone interference grounded aircraft. By 9:57 p.m., 50% of the perimeter was trailed.
